result.eng: Do they know where we are?

result.eng: I didn't know whether I should stay or go.

result.eng: As far as I know, this is true.

result.eng: Why do you not know?

result.eng: As you know, the deadline is tomorrow.

result.eng: I don't know what time it is.

result.eng: They don't understand their own business. They don't know what they are doing.

result.eng: I know that it is at two o'clock that my interview is to take place.

result.orig: níl a fhios agam
result.html: níl a fhios agamI don't know.

result.eng: I know well that you are proud of her, and not without reason.
result.ga: tá a fhios agam go maith go bhfuil tú bródúil aisti agus údar agat

result.eng: I will know then whether there is any cause for my jealousy.
result.ga: beidh a fhios agam ansin an bhfuil údar le m'éad

result.ponchtml: beiḋ a ḟios agam ansin an ḃfuil údar le m'éadI will know then whether there is any cause for my jealousy.

result.eng: I have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.

result.eng: As we know now, the Nazis didn't stop with Poland.

result.eng: And you should know that they look with favour on what priests say in Dublin.
result.ga: agus bíodh a fhios agat go mbíonn toradh i mbaile Átha cliath fá choinne na sagart

result.eng: I don't know what I'd do without you.
result.ga: níl a fhios agam goidé a dhéanfainn ach go bé thú
result.orig: níl a fhios agam goidé a dhéanfainn ach go bé thú

result.eng: They haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.
result.ga: ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huair
result.orig: ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huair

result.ponchtml: ní ḃfuair siad aon ġreim le níl a ḟios agam cá huairThey haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.

result.eng: You should know that going abroad is no picnic.
result.ga: bíodh a fhios agat nach só ar bith atá i ndán duit ar an choigrích
result.orig: bíodh a fhios agat nach só ar bith atá i ndán duit ar an choigrích

result.ponchtml: bíoḋ a ḟios agat naċ só ar biṫ atá i ndán duit ar an ċoigríċYou should know that going abroad is no picnic.

result.eng: You will know you shouldn't grab a hen by its wing.
result.ga: beidh a fhios agat gan greim eiteoga a fháil ar chirc
result.orig: beidh a fhios agat gan greim eiteoga a fháil ar chirc
result.html: beidh a fhios agat gan greim eiteoga a fháil ar chircYou will know you shouldn't grab a hen by its wing.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ a ḟios agat gan greim eiteoga a ḟáil ar ċircYou will know you shouldn't grab a hen by its wing.

result.eng: You know what my advice to you is?
